title: CyberArk EPM Raw Events
description: This dashboard offers complete visibility into raw audit events captured by CyberArk EPM, including application activities, threat detection insights, and detailed event-level information.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers complete visibility into raw audit events captured by CyberArk EPM, including application activities, threat detection insights, and detailed event-level information.

For more information, see the [CyberArk Endpoint Privilege Manager Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cyberark_endpoint_privilege_manager/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

This group provides a consolidated view of raw audit events from CyberArk EPM, helping you track overall activity trends, identify high-volume behaviors, and quickly spot unusual patterns across users, and event types.

search.query: source:cyberark-endpoint-privilege-manager service:raw-events $event_name $file_name $user_name $source_type $set_name $computer_name
source:cyberark-endpoint-privilege-manager service:raw-events $event_name $file_name $user_name $source_type $set_name $computer_name
source:cyberark-endpoint-privilege-manager service:raw-events $event_name $file_name $user_name $source_type $set_name $computer_name
source:cyberark-endpoint-privilege-manager service:raw-events $event_name $source_type $user_name $set_name $computer_name
source:cyberark-endpoint-privilege-manager service:raw-events -@usr.name:"" $event_name $file_name $user_name $source_type $set_name $computer_name

definition.content: This group provides a comprehensive view of application-level activity, including normal and restricted actions, blocked operations, and ransomware-related events. It helps track trends over time, identify top users and files involved, and investigate detailed event and product-level information for security and operational insights.

search.query: source:cyberark-endpoint-privilege-manager service:raw-events @evt.name:(ElevationRequest OR Trust OR Installation OR Launch OR ManualRequest OR Block OR RestrictAccess OR DetectAccess OR Ransomware) $event_name $file_name $user_name $source_type $set_name $computer_name

definition.content: This group provides an overview of detected threats and suspicious activity across endpoints, tracking event trends, attack vs. block outcomes, affected users and files, logon failures, and source information. It helps identify high-risk behaviors, evaluate policy effectiveness, and investigate detailed threat and process-level events.

search.query: source:cyberark-endpoint-privilege-manager service:raw-events @evt.name:(AttackAttempt OR AttackBlock OR SuspiciousActivityAttempt OR SuspiciousActivityblock) $event_name $file_name $user_name $source_type $set_name $computer_name
